snippet: Spanish police say they have arrested 24 members of a Colombian drug ring seeking to establish a network for the wholesale distribution of cocaine....

headline.main: Trump, Offering No Evidence, Says Obama Tapped His Phones
headline.print_headline: With No Proof,Trump Claims Obama Tapped

lead_paragraph: Spanish police say they have arrested 24 members of a Colombian drug ring seeking to establish a network for the wholesale distribution of cocaine.
